---
title: "Customize model inventory layout"
---

Configure the information that displays on the model inventory, and swap between inventory views. 

:::{.callout}
Changes are automatically saved to your account and will not affect other users.
:::

## Prerequisites

There are models registered in the model inventory.

::: {.column-margin}
Learn how to [register models in the inventory](register-models-in-model-inventory.qmd).
:::

## Steps

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

2. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.

3. Click **{{< fa table >}} Manage Columns** to manage column visibility and order. To use this feature, make sure you're in table view.

   You can toggle visibility for each category and drag each option to change the order:


   ![](manage-columns-demo.gif){width=80% fig-alt="An animation that shows how to manage columns in the model inventory."}

#### Inventory display views

- To display the inventory in table view, click **{{< fa table >}} Display table**. 
- To display the inventory in card view, click **Display cards**.
